title: Vivek M
summary:
·A skilled HR Professional with 6 years of rich and hands on
experience in the areas of, General Administration and Recruitment
at Factory level and Corporate Level with reputed organizations.
·Extensive experience in Recruitment, human resource
management & development. Proven track record of achieving high motivation levels amongst employees, ensuring strict compliance with Labour Laws.

experience.description:
• T eam management: Led a team of HR Associates across multiple
branches, en suring smooth HR operations at the field and corporate
levels. Coordinated efforts across recruitment, compliance, and
employee engagement.
• Recruitment & Talent management: Managed high-volume hiring across
rural and urban locations for field officers, credit managers, and support
staff. Designed localized recruitment strategies that improved candidate
quality and reduced attrition.
• Exit management & F&F Settlements: Oversaw offboarding processes,
ensuring accurate full and final settlements (including gratuity, bonus,
and leave encashment) as per company policy and statutory norms.
• Payroll & HRIS management: Supervised payroll for 1,000+ employees,
including processing salary, deductions, TDS, and variable pay
components. Maintained employee data through HRIS and ensured data
accuracy.
• Statutory Compliance & Labour Laws: Ensured end-to-end statutory
compliance with PF, ESI, PT, LWF, Bonus Act, Payment of Gratuity Act,
and state-specific labour laws. Coordinated with auditors for compliance
audits and labour inspections.
• Financial Fraud Monitoring: Played a key role in identifying and
investigating employee-level financial frauds (e.g., misappropriation of
disbursements, forged documentation). Coordinated with internal audit
and legal departments for disciplinary action and fraud prevention
training.
• HR Policy Implementation: Contributed to drafting and updating HR
policies in line with organizational goals and RBI guidelines for NBFCLANGUAGES
MFIs. Trained field HR staff on HR best practices and compliance.

• Oversee end-to-end recruitment processes, including sourcing, screening, interviewing, and onboarding
candidates for various roles across the organization.·Collaborate with hiring managers to understand staffing
needs, develop job descriptions, and implement effective recruitment strategies.
• Utilize job portals, social media, and networking events to attract Employee Relations and Engagement: Act as
a trusted advisor to employees and management on HR policies, procedures, and employment-related
matters.
• Proactively adder employee concerns, grievances, and conflicts) to maintain a positive work environment.
• Plan and organize employee engagement initiatives, such as team- building activities, cultural events, and
wellness programs. Performance management: Administer performance appraisal processes, including goal
setting, mid-year reviews, and annual evaluations.
• Provide guidance to managers on conducting performance discussions, setting objectives, and delivering
feedback.
• Identify training and development needs based on performance assessments to support employee growth
and career advancement.
Training and Development:
• Assess training needs and develop training plans to enhance employee skills and competencies.
• Coordinate training programs on topics such as leadership development, communication skills, and
compliance training.
HR Policy Development and Compliance:
• Implement and communicate HR policies and procedures in compliance with Indian labor laws and
regulations. Ensure adherence to statutory requirements related to employment contracts, leave entitlements,
and workplace safety. ·Conduct regular audits to monitor compliance and address any discrepancies or areas
of non- compliance.
• Employee Performance and Career Development: Facilitate career development discussions and support
employees in identifying growth opportunities within the organization. Conduct exit interviews and analyze
feedback to identify trends and areas for improvement in employee retention.
HR Analytics and Reporting:·Utilize SAP Success Factors ERP and other data analytics Tools to generate reports
and analyze HR metrics, such as turnover rates, absenteeism, and employee demographics.
• Prepare management reports and presentations to communicate key HR insights and trends to senior
leadership.

HR Recruiter Activities:
• Partnering with hiringmanagers to determinestaffing needs.
• Performing in-person and phone interviews with candidates
• Coordinating interviews with the hiring managers
• Maintaining relationships with both internal and external clientsto ensure staffinggoals are achieved.
• Staying current on the company’s organization structure, personnel policy,and federal and state laws
regarding employment practices
• Serving as a liaison with area employment agencies, colleges, and industry associations
• Conduct regular follow-up with managers to determine the effectiveness of recruiting plans and
implementation.
• Develop a pool of qualifiedcandidates in advanceof need.
Enlist job postings on forums which can source new candidates at the time of hiring such as newspapers,
social media, advertisements, etc.
• Conduct interviews and tests of the applicants to filter them further and advance them to the next level
relevant to their job posting.
• Supervising the onboarding and induction of the new joiner in the organization.
• Conducting Fire safety drills and POSH activities in the office.
• Plan daily routes of market visit for the employees visiting Bangalore office from other zonal offices. Check all
the safety equipment’s are present in the vehicles allotted.
• Selecting pool of hotels and lodgesfor the employees visiting Bangalore office on Business purpose. Getting in
contract them for the future needs.
• Promote safe work activities by conducting safetyaudits, attending companysafety meetings, and meeting
with individual staff members.
• Monitor spending to ensure that expenses are consistent with approved budgets.
• Coordinate with the transport vendor and arrange vehicles when the official trips of the clients, dealers,
distributors have to be planned.
• Preparing the monthly budget for the transportation of the staff and other misc., travel by the company
officials.
• Planning of the travel of the new joiners from their home location to the office location and spoc to approve
their reimbursement.

• Ha ndling End to End recruit ment cycle
• Plan & implementcompany talent acquisition strategy alongside designing the job analysis
• Conducting induction for newly joinedemployees
• Handling statutory compliance in relation to PF, ESIC, & legal compliance, attendance management & CSR
related activities
• Maintaining employee records& monitoring attendance on daily basis
• Supporting the payrollprocess by preparingthe employee databasewhich includes
• new hires, transfers, terminations, retainers, promotion, retirement etc.,
• Maintaining a primary backup for payrollprocessing by updatingthe bank account tracking, tracking earned /
sick pay.
• Reward & Recognition - Educating &approving R&R as per HR policy &ensuring all eligible candidate are
included on monthly basis,
• Performance reviews & promotions of employees
• Vouching of employeereimbursement bills such as medical,official travel, incentives etc.
• Ensuring the compliance with labor regulations.

summary: HR professional with over 3 years of experience in HR Business Partnering, Performance management, Employee Engagement and Talent Acquisition. experience.position: Associate HR, Human Resource Business Partner (HRBP)
experience.description:
• Facilitated 1:1s, skip-level meetings, and stay interviews to understand employee sentiment, identify early retention risks, and strengthen leadership–employee connect for more 2 BUs
• Drove employee engagement and retention initiatives by conducting exit interviews, managing grievance cases, running pulse feedback sessions, and supporting action planning with managers.
• Managed employee relations and conflict resolution cases, ensuring fairness, timely closure, and adherence to company policies.
• Supported workforce rationalization initiatives, including handling employee separations due to cost optimization in a compliant, transparent, and empathetic manner.
• Collaborated closely with the Compensation & Benefits (C&B) team to prepare comprehensive compensation data to support counter-offer evaluations and salary discussions with employees and managers.
• Analysed HR data and dashboards to highlight trends in engagement, attrition, and performance, and provide insights for business decisions.
• Led the Rewards & Recognition process end-to-end, including budget planning, nomination management, documentation, timely rollout of awards, and reconciliation.
• Supported promotion and talent review cycles by validating eligibility, coordinating approvals, and ensuring accurate documentation.
• Partnered with business leaders on capability development, identifying skill gaps and coordinating targeted learning interventions with the L&D team.
• Managed end-to-end recruitment across niche tech roles (Java, Node.js, Python, Automation, UI, NMS, Wireless/RAN Testing, FPGA, Firmware) and critical non-R&D roles.
• Partnered with business leaders to define workforce needs, create accurate JDs, and align hiring plans with project and organizational priorities.
• Built strong sourcing pipelines and improved quality of hire using Naukri, LinkedIn, referrals, and proactive market mapping.
• Conducted 100+ screenings and interviews, ensuring strong assessment of technical capability, behavioural fit, and long-term potential.
• Improved candidate experience by ensuring timely communication, smooth interview coordination, and seamless onboarding; released offers through DarwinBox.
• Negotiated offers and collaborated with C&B to provide comprehensive compensation data, enabling competitive offers and effective counter-offer decisions.
• Delivered recruitment dashboards and insights, enhancing hiring visibility and supporting data-driven decision-making for leadership.

• Supported in developing and managed end-to-end project management processes throughout the entire engagement life cycle, ensuring timely and quality delivery.
• Identified, monitored, and mitigated project risks and issues, proactively resolving blockers to maintain smooth execution.
• Conducted financial analysis on revenue, project profitability, cost variances, and improvement opportunities to support business decisions.
• Calculated project costs and operational expenses, preparing and submitting detailed weekly financial and progress reports to clients.

summary: Creating and carrying out procedures that cover each phase of the employee life cycle, from hiring to retirement, as well as coordinating and managing a variety of initiatives and employee engagement programs to foster positive work environment.

summary: HR professional with over 3 years of experience in HR Business Partnering, Performance management, Employee Engagement and Talent Acquisition. Skilled at partnering with business leaders on workforce planning, improving employee experience, and supporting a high-performance and inclusive organizational culture.

experience.position: Associate HR, Human Resource Business Partner (HRBP)
experience.description:
• Facilitated **1:1s**, **skip-level meetings**, and **stay interviews** to understand employee sentiment, identify early retention risks, and strengthen leadership–employee connect for more 2 BUs
• Drove **employee engagement** and **retention initiatives** by conducting **exit interviews**, **managing grievance** cases, running **pulse feedback** sessions, and supporting action planning with managers.
• Managed **employee relations and conflict resolution** cases, ensuring fairness, timely closure, and adherence to company policies.
• Supported **workforce rationalization initiatives**, including handling employee separations due to cost optimization in a compliant, transparent, and empathetic manner.
• Collaborated closely with the Compensation & Benefits (C&B) team to prepare comprehensive compensation data to support **counter-offer evaluations** and salary discussions with employees and managers.
• Analysed **HR data and dashboards** to highlight trends in engagement, attrition, and performance, and provide insights for business decisions.
• Led the **Rewards & Recognition** process end-to-end, including budget planning, nomination management, documentation, timely rollout of awards, and reconciliation.
• Supported **promotion and talent review cycles** by validating eligibility, coordinating approvals, and ensuring accurate documentation.
• **Partnered with business leaders** on **capability development**, **identifying skill gaps** and coordinating **targeted learning interventions** with theL&Dteam.
• Managed **end-to-end recruitment** across **niche tech roles** (Java, Node.js, Python, Automation, UI, NMS, Wireless/RAN Testing, FPGA, Firmware) and critical non-R&Droles.
• Partnered with business leaders to **define workforce needs, create accurate JDs, and align hiring plans** with project and organizational priorities.
• Built strong **sourcing pipelines** and improved quality of hire using Naukri, LinkedIn, referrals, and proactive market mapping.
• Conducted 100+ screenings and interviews, ensuring strong **assessment of technical capability**, **behavioural fit**, and **long-term potential**.
• Improved **candidate experience** by ensuring timely communication, smooth interview coordination, and seamless onboarding; released offers through DarwinBox.
• **Negotiated offers** and **collaborated withC&B** to provide comprehensive compensation data, enabling competitive offers and effective counter-offer decisions.
• Delivered **recruitment dashboards and insights**, enhancing hiring visibility and supporting data-driven decision-making for leadership.

• Supported in **developing and managed end-to-end project management processes** throughout the entire engagement life cycle, ensuring timely and quality delivery.
• **Identified**, **monitored**, and **mitigated** **project risks and issues**, proactively **resolving blockers** to maintain smooth execution.
• Conducted **financial analysis** on revenue, project profitability, cost variances, and improvement opportunities to support business decisions.
• Calculated **project costs and operational expenses**, preparing and submitting detailed weekly **financial and progress reports** to clients.

title: Saumitra Sinha Roy
summary:
Dynamic Human Resource Professional with over 15 years of experience in recruitment, manpower management, and talent acquisition. Skilled at leading recruitment strategies for IT and non-IT roles, managing high-performing teams, and driving business-aligned hiring initiatives. Proven track record of optimizing recruitment operations, mentoring teams, and exceeding organizational goals through strategic planning and execution. Proficient in using HR software such as Darwin Box and Workday, with a strong understanding of automation in recruitment cycles. Key Skills
• Talent Acquisition & Recruitment Strategy • Leadership & Lateral Hiring • Stakeholder management • Manpower Planning & AOP Execution • Recruitment Automation & Project Delivery • HRIS Tools – Workday, Darwin Box • Team management & Mentorship • Market Intelligence & Reporting

experience.description:

• Driving automation of the recruitment cycle in collaboration with internal tech teams.

• Utilized Darwin Box to track, manage, and report recruitment workflows.

• Engaged with hiring managers, created hiring plans, and improved interview & onboarding experience.
• Led strategy for hiring across Java, .NET, DevOps, AWS, ReactJS, HRIS, and finance roles.
• Used Workday to manage talent pipelines, reporting, and recruiter performance.
• Conducted daily update calls with stakeholders and resolved hiring challenges in real-time.
• Oversaw candidate engagement post-offer and offer-to-joining processes.

• Maintained offer-to-joining ratio, BGV, post-offer engagement, and hiring manager communication.
• Conducted decline analysis and managed stakeholder reporting and candidate onboarding process.

• Conducted talent mapping, strategic sourcing using AIRS and unconventional techniques.
• Led EKART Employee Referral Programs and partnered with multiple vendors.
• Executed hiring across business verticals through social media and passive sourcing.

• Managed end-to-end recruitment for multiple levels and tech hiring under contract-to-hire model.
• Coordinated with hiring managers for manpower planning and ensured SLA compliance.
• Handled candidate assessment, salary negotiation, and HRBP responsibilities for contract roles.

• Led a6-member recruitment team, sourcing via portals, referrals, and direct walk-ins.
• Managed end-to-end hiring lifecycle from screening to client coordination and offer rollouts.
• Provided phone-based service for credit card clients in North America.

summary: A results-oriented HR Executive/HR Business Partner with 6+ years of experience driving HR operations and strategic initiatives across multi-site retail environments. Expertise in talent acquisition, performance management, HRMS, payroll processing, and statutory compliance, with a strong command of HR analytics and MS Excel for data-driven decision-making.

experience.description:

• Ensured compliance with labor laws (PF, ESIC, Shops & Establishment Act) and managed employee relations, including conflict resolution and addressing grievances, while maintaining meticulous employee records in the HRMS.
• Utilized strong negotiation and interpersonal skills to effectively manage stakeholder relationships and influence decision-making.
